tool.summary: Line simplification implementing the Ramer-Douglas-Peucker algorithm. Refererences: - Ramer, U. (1972): An iterative procedure for the polygonal approximation of plane curves. Computer Graphics and Image Processing, 1(3), 244-256 - Douglas, D., Peucker, T. (1973): Algorithms for the reduction of the number of points required to represent a digitized line or its caricature. The Canadian Cartographer 10(2), 112-122 - Polyline Reduction source code at mappinghacks.com
